posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase T210 Old Mill catchers with chest protectors on that do not have creases.

Have the following already: Dudley, Laughlin, Lucia, Munson, Kunkel, and Wahl.

Thanks,


Patrick

Hi Jason,

Go ahead and send scans and pricing please. Sent an email response requesting the same.


Thanks.


Patrick

Thanks again Jason,

I'll mail the payment tomorrow.

Patrick

Hi Jason,

Mailed the payment this morning. Let me know when you receive it.

Thanks again,


Patrick

Looking for only 2 more T210 catchers with their chest protectors on:


T210-5 Frank Harrington, Spartansburg Spartans, Carolina Association
T210-6 Ade Thoss, Richmond Pioneers, Blue grass League

Paying top dollar for nice examples.

Thanks,


Patrick

Hi Jason,

Would be interested..sent an email requesting scan and price.

Many thanks,

Patrick

Thanks again Jason.

Payment for the Frank Harrington T210-5 will go out on Monday.

Happy Holidays,


Patrick

Need just the T210-6 Ade Thoss, Richmond Pioneers, Blue grass League
to complete my run of T210 Old Mill catchers with chest protectors.

Looking for a nice creaseless example.

Thanks,


Patrick

Hi Jason,

Payment for the T210-5 Harrington went out this morning.

Many thanks,


Patrick
